title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Mortgage Banks, Supervisory Procedure 104 - Application for a Change in Control of a Mortgage Broker
content:

§ 104.2 - Application forms and assistance, version 3
§ 104.3 - Definitions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Mortgage Banks, Supervisory Procedure 104

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 12, 594-b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
